comments.text:
STEPS TO REPRODUCE:
 1. Enable Compiz (desktop effects) if it's not already enabled. (It is by default, IIRC). (gnome-appearance-properties, Visual Effects tab, & pick anything but "none")
 2. In Minefield / Firefox: do Tools | Web Console
 3. Type "document" and press enter
 4. Click "[object HTMLDocument]" to bring up the Inspector popup
 5. Ctrl+Alt+Right to switch to another workspace/virtual-desktop

ACTUAL RESULTS: The inspector popup follows me.

NOTE: The inspector popup also seems to refuse to take focus, for some reason - its titlebar always has the "unfocused" appearance, as opposed to e.g. the Help|About dialog, which can get the "focused" appearance.

NOTE: If I disable desktop effects*, then the inspector popup stops following me.

* gnome-appearance-properties, Visual Effects tab, & pick "None"
